sourcesContent:
"use client" import { useState, useEffect } from "react" import { Link, useParams } from "react-router-dom" import { FaStar, FaRegStar, FaStarHalfAlt, FaHeart, FaShoppingCart, FaFacebookF, FaTwitter, FaPinterestP, FaInstagram, } from "react-icons/fa" import "./ProductDetail.css" // Sample product data (same as in Shop.jsx) const productsData = [ { id: 1, name: "Blue Topaz Diamond Engagement Wedding Ring", category: "Rings", price: { min: 190, max: 210 }, rating: 4.5, image: "/featured1.jpeg", discount: 5, metal: "Yellow Gold", carat: "14KT", stone: "Diamond", stoneColor: "Blue", description: "This stunning Blue Topaz Diamond Engagement Wedding Ring features a brilliant oval-cut blue topaz surrounded by a halo of sparkling diamonds. Set in 14KT yellow gold, this ring combines timeless elegance with a touch of color for a unique engagement piece.", additionalImages: [ "/images/products/blue-topaz-ring-angle1.jpg", "/images/products/blue-topaz-ring-angle2.jpg", "/images/products/blue-topaz-ring-angle3.jpg", ], specifications: { metal: "14KT Yellow Gold", stone: "Blue Topaz, Diamond", caratWeight: "Topaz: 1.5ct, Diamonds: 0.25ct total", clarity: "VS", color: "Blue, White", setting: "Prong", bandWidth: "2mm", }, reviews: [ { id: 1, user: "Emily R.", rating: 5, date: "March 15, 2025", comment: "Absolutely gorgeous ring! The blue topaz is vibrant and the diamonds sparkle beautifully. My fiancÃ©e loves it!", }, { id: 2, user: "Michael T.", rating: 4, date: "February 28, 2025", comment: "Beautiful craftsmanship. The color is slightly different than in the photos, but still stunning.", }, ], }, { id: 2, name: "Buy Diamond Ed Pendant Yellow Gold / 14KT", category: "Necklaces", price: { min: 120, max: 190 }, rating: 5, image: "/images/products/diamond-pendant.jpg", discount: 5, metal: "Yellow Gold", carat: "14KT", stone: "Diamond", stoneColor: "White", description: "This elegant Diamond Ed Pendant in 14KT Yellow Gold features a unique design with brilliant-cut diamonds. The pendant hangs from a delicate gold chain, creating a piece that's perfect for everyday luxury or special occasions.", additionalImages: [ "/images/products/diamond-pendant-angle1.jpg", "/images/products/diamond-pendant-angle2.jpg", "/images/products/diamond-pendant-angle3.jpg", ], specifications: { metal: "14KT Yellow Gold", stone: "Diamond", caratWeight: "0.15ct total", clarity: "SI1-SI2", color: "G-H", chainLength: "18 inches", pendantSize: "12mm x 8mm", }, reviews: [ { id: 1, user: "Sarah J.", rating: 5, date: "March 20, 2025", comment: "This pendant is absolutely beautiful! It catches the light perfectly and I've received so many compliments.", }, { id: 2, user: "David L.", rating: 5, date: "March 5, 2025", comment: "Purchased this for my wife's birthday and she loves it. Great quality and the diamonds are very sparkly.", }, ], }, ] const ProductDetail = () => { const { id } = useParams() const [product, setProduct] = useState(null) const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true) const [mainImage, setMainImage] = useState("") const [quantity, setQuantity] = useState(1) const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState("description") useEffect(() => { // Simulate API call to fetch product details const fetchProduct = () => { setLoading(true) // Find product by ID const foundProduct = productsData.find((p) => p.id === Number.parseInt(id)) if (foundProduct) { setProduct(foundProduct) setMainImage(foundProduct.image) } setLoading(false) } fetchProduct() }, [id]) const handleImageChange = (image) => { setMainImage(image) } const handleQuantityChange = (e) => { const value = Number.parseInt(e.target.value) if (value > 0) { setQuantity(value) } } const incrementQuantity = () => { setQuantity(quantity + 1) } const decrementQuantity = () => { if (quantity > 1) { setQuantity(quantity - 1) } } const changeTab = (tab) => { setActiveTab(tab) } // Render star ratings const renderStarRating = (rating) => { const stars = [] const fullStars = Math.floor(rating) const hasHalfStar = rating % 1 !== 0 for (let i = 1; i <= 5; i++) { if (i <= fullStars) { stars.push() } else if (i === fullStars + 1 && hasHalfStar) { stars.push() } else { stars.push() } } return stars } if (loading) { return (

Loading product details...

) } if (!product) { return (

Product Not Found

The product you are looking for does not exist or has been removed.

Back to Shop
) } return (
{/* Product Header */}
Home / Shop / {product.name}
{/* Product Images */}
{product.discount && -{product.discount}%}
handleImageChange(product.image)} >
{product.additionalImages && product.additionalImages.map((image, index) => (
handleImageChange(image)} >
))}
{/* Product Info */}

{product.name}

{renderStarRating(product.rating)} ({product.reviews ? product.reviews.length : 0} reviews)
Category: {product.category}
${product.price.min} â ${product.price.max}

{product.description}

Metal: {product.metal}
Carat: {product.carat}
Stone: {product.stone}
Stone Color: {product.stoneColor}
Share:
{/* Product Tabs */}
{activeTab === "description" && (

{product.description}

Our jewelry is crafted with the utmost attention to detail, ensuring that each piece meets our high standards of quality and beauty. We use only the finest materials, including ethically sourced gemstones and precious metals.

Each piece comes with a certificate of authenticity and is packaged in a luxurious gift box, making it perfect for gifting or treating yourself to something special.

)} {activeTab === "specifications" && (
{product.specifications && Object.entries(product.specifications).map(([key, value], index) => ( ))}
{key.charAt(0).toUpperCase() + key.slice(1).replace(/([A-Z])/g, " $1")} {value}
)} {activeTab === "reviews" && (
{product.reviews && product.reviews.length > 0 ? (
{product.reviews.map((review) => (
{review.user}
{renderStarRating(review.rating)}
{review.date}

{review.comment}

))}
) : (

There are no reviews yet.

)}

Write a Review

{[1, 2, 3, 4, 5].map((star) => ( ))}
)}
{/* Related Products */}

Related Products

{productsData .filter((p) => p.id !== product.id && p.category === product.category) .slice(0, 4) .map((relatedProduct) => (
{relatedProduct.discount && -{relatedProduct.discount}%}

{relatedProduct.name}

{renderStarRating(relatedProduct.rating)}
${relatedProduct.price.min} â ${relatedProduct.price.max}
))}
) } export default ProductDetail
